metadata.title: CVE-2020-36314 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
fr-archive-libarchive.c in GNOME file-roller through 3.38.0, as used byGNOME Shell and other software, allows Directory Traversal duringextraction because it lacks a check of whether a file's parent is a symlinkin certain complex situations. NOTE: this issue exists because of anincomplete fix for CVE-2020-11736.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-36314` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

file-roller - 3.28.0-1ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: file-roller package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.28.0-1ubuntu1.3').
